snippet: The overhaul plan, by a group that includes former White House and Treasury officials, would raise an additional $1.8 trillion in the first decade.
abstract: The overhaul plan, by a group that includes former White House and Treasury officials, would raise an additional $1.8 trillion in the first decade.
lead_paragraph: Democratic luminaries with ties to the Obama and Clinton administrations, including two former Treasury secretaries and two former White House chiefs of staff, on Tuesday will enter the tax debate with an overhaul plan that would raise an additional $1.8 trillion in the first decade.

headline.main: Democratic Group to Offer Tax Plan With Huge Payoff
